name: 劉碩雅
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
週數	日期	進度	頁數
1	2/18	Introduction to the course
2	2/25	R: Understand Vocabulary from Text	p.13-17
3	3/4	L: Understand the Gist	p.128-129
4	3/11	S: Plan and Make the Free Choice Response	p.193-198
5	3/18	W: Note the Main Point as You Read	p. 251-252
6	3/25	R: Recognize Referents	p.19-25
7	4/1	L: Understand the Details	p.133-138
8	4/8	S: Plan and Make the Paired-choice Response	p.199-203
9	4/15	期中考
10	4/22	W: Note the Main Point as You Listen	p. 255-256
11	4/29	R: Simplify Meanings of Sentences	p. 28-34
12	5/6	L: Understand the Function	p.143-147
13	5/13	S: Note the Main Points (I)	p. 205-213
14	5/20	W: Plan and Write a Topic	p. 259-262
15	5/27	R: Insert Sentences into the Passage	p. 37-48
16	6/3	L: Understand the Speaker’s Stance	p.152-159
17	6/10	S: Note the Main Points (II)	p. 215-222
18	6/17	期末考
materials:
Longman Preparation Course for the TOEFL Test iBT
Vocabulary Reader
